AllowedInboundTraffic: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName,domainId AS 'Domain', Action,eventdirection AS 'Event Direction', FULLNETWORKNAME(SourceIP, DomainID)  AS  'Source Network', LOGSOURCENAME(logSourceId) AS 'Log Source', CATEGORYNAME(category) AS 'Low Level Category', FULLNETWORKNAME(destinationip, domainId) as 'Destination Network', sourceIP  AS  'Source IP',sourcePort  AS  'Source Port',destinationIP  AS  'Destination IP', LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) AS 'Log Source Type',destinationPort  AS  'Destination Port',QIDNAME(qid)  AS  'Event Name', eventCount  AS  'Event Count',startTime  AS  'Start Time', destinationGeographicLocation AS 'Destination Geographic Country/Region',"Rule Name" as 'Rule Name', "Bytes Received" as 'Bytes Received', "Bytes Sent" as 'Bytes Sent', Application as 'Application', "Destination Zone" as 'Destination Zone', "Source Zone" as 'Source Zone', "Firewall Module" as 'Firewall Name', "Policy Name", "Device Name", "URL Domain", "Service Name", Policy FROM events WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' AND ((destinationport NOT IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 43, 161, 162) AND ((highlevelcategory = 4000 AND category IN (4002, 4007, 4012, 4016, 4025, 4027, 4031, 4037, 4039))) AND NOT (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('0.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', sourceip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', sourceip) OR INCIDR('169.254.0.0/16', sourceip) OR INCIDR ('127.0.0.0/8', sourceip)) AND (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',destinationip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', destinationip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', destinationip)) AND FULLNETWORKNAME(sourceip, domainId) = 'other' AND LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) != 'Custom Rule Engine' AND NOT referencesetcontains('Known DNS traffic', destinationIP))) START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPNAME(PROCESSORNAME({event_processor}))
